title: Boulder fort
data:
In *NetHack*, a **boulder fort** refers to the strategic placement of [boulders](/wiki/Boulder "Boulder") to control the generation or movement of [monsters](/wiki/Monster "Monster") around [you](/wiki/You "You"), taking advantage of the fact that few monsters can move onto boulders.

## Strategy

A basic use of a boulder fort is as a protection or escape tactic. You can read a blessed [scroll of earth](/wiki/Scroll_of_earth "Scroll of earth") if an arch-lich is summoning too many monsters, or you can take out difficult monsters such as [quest nemeses](/wiki/Quest_nemeses "Quest nemeses") from behind a strategic boulder fort on the stairs up.

You can [trap a temple priest in a boulder fort](/wiki/Aligned_priest#Trapping_an_aligned_priest_with_boulders "Aligned priest") in order to convert the altar without interference.

Boulder forts are useful for [extinctionism](/wiki/Extinctionism "Extinctionism") or [farming](/wiki/Farming "Farming"), because they can force monsters to be created on (and able to attack you from) a certain spot, such as an [altar](/wiki/Altar "Altar"). The keystroke sequence necessary for mass monster slaying becomes rather simple and less [error-prone](/wiki/Paste "Paste") in a fort.

```
.....
.000.
.0_0.
.0@0.
.000.
.....
```

Boulder forts are vulnerable to hostile monsters zapping [wands of striking](/wiki/Wand_of_striking "Wand of striking") at you from outside and smashing the boulders. [Ghosts](/wiki/Ghost "Ghost"), [giants](/wiki/Giant "Giant"), and [xorns](/wiki/Xorn "Xorn") can also move onto squares containing boulders. However, monsters cannot occupy the same square as one another, so for better security, some players opt for a **boulder-jelly fort**: a fort where the boulders sit on top of [blue jellies](/wiki/Blue_jelly "Blue jelly") (or other [sessile](/wiki/Sessile "Sessile") monsters), which never move. This is still not foolproof, but it is pretty solid. For maximum (but still not foolproof) security, you may want to make a boulder-jelly fort where each jelly is sitting on a [scroll of scare monster](/wiki/Scroll_of_scare_monster "Scroll of scare monster").

## External links

- [Can confused monsters attack my boulder+jelly fort?](http://groups.google.com/group/rec.games.roguelike.nethack/browse_thread/thread/5b820d4813016fe1/9a2636a404eab573#9a2636a404eab573)
